display.title: Neutronium
description: &&6Neutronium&&r is a hyper-dense material normally found in the hearts of neutron stars: the collapsed cores of stars between ten and thirty times the size of the sun. It is the final primary material in GTCEu.

&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o In GCYL, Neutronium is unlocked at UMV-tier (called UXV in CEu). There is also Cosmic Neutronium, which is equivalent to Avaritia's Neutronium in GT5u, which was unlocked even later in GCYL!

&&l&&3More Lore:&&r&&o Fun Fact: a single Neutronium block is approximately 2884 million metric tons and somewhere around 600000K, yet you're somehow capable of holding one with your bare hands. Don't think about it too much.
